channel.title: [pi] dupe how to fix? inc. video
channel.description:
Hi everyone, I have a dupe on my server and I'm trying to get rid of it.
It works like this:
Two players trade, in the second screen the first player accepts, and the second player first accepts and than clicks really quick on the minimap. I've tried to fix it but if you click a lot quicker it'll still work I think ( can't remember how I tried fixing it ) anyone knows where and how to fix this?
NOT CLEAR ENOUGH? CHECK OUT THIS VIDEO (ITS SHOWING THE DUPE): http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DCWAzfzIzeA
Thanks so much for anyone who even makes a suggestion on how to fix this :)

item.title: [pi] dupe how to fix? inc. video
item.dc:creator: @Nonamee Nonamee
item.description:
@Nonamee wrote:

EDIT:

[quote=“escalation, post:9, topic:410176”]I have a solution for you…

lmgtfy.com

LMGTFY

LMGTFY

It WILL fix the dupe.[/quote]

Click the first one. I saw people say it worked, try it.

Read full topic

item.title: [pi] dupe how to fix? inc. video
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

Try adding

if(c.inTrade) { return; }
under the respawnTimer > )
I’m still tryin to figure it out so gimi a sec if that don’t work.

Read full topic
item.source: [pi] dupe how to fix? inc. video
